    • Method Detail

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword(java.lang.String passwordString)
                               throws LengthException,
                                      NoDigitException,
                                      NoUpperAlphaException,
                                      NoLowerAlphaException,
                                      NoSpecialCharacterException,
                                      InvalidSequenceException
        Returns true if password is valid, Throws exceptions for invalid passwords
        Parameters:
        passwordString - String to be checked for validity
        Returns:
        True if password is valid, throws a exception if password is invalid
        Throws:
        LengthException - Thrown if length is less than 6 characters
        NoDigitException - Thrown if there is no digit
        NoUpperAlphaException - Thrown if there is no uppercase alphabetic
        NoLowerAlphaException - Thrown if there is no lowercase alphabetic
        NoSpecialCharacterException - Thrown if there is no special character
        InvalidSequenceException - Thrown if there is more than 2 characters in sequence

      • isWeakPassword

        public static boolean isWeakPassword(java.lang.String passwordString)
        Return true if length of password is greater than or equal to 6 but less than equal to 9
        Parameters:
        passwordString - String to be checked if it is weak
        Returns:
        True if length of password is greater than or equal to 6 but less than or equal to 9

      • getInvalidPasswords

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInvalidPasswords(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> passwords)
        Returns and ArrayList of invalid passwords with their exception messages. Weak passwords are not included
        Parameters:
        passwords - ArrayList to be checked for validity
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of invalid passwords, not including weak ones.

      • checkLength

        private static void checkLength(java.lang.String passwordString)
                         throws LengthException
        Checks to see is password is long enough
        Parameters:
        passwordString - Password which length is checked
        Throws:
        LengthException - Thrown if password is less than 6 characters

                            throws NoUpperAlphaException
        Checks if the password has a uppercase alpha character
        Parameters:
        passwordString - Password which is searched for a uppercase alpha character
        Throws:
        NoUpperAlphaException - Thrown is no uppercase alpha is found
